channel.title: Sweden on Sam Norbury
channel.description: Recent content in Sweden on Sam Norbury

item.title: Sweden - Day 1
item.description: So I'm on a train. Have been for 14 hours and there's still 4 to go. 18 hours is probably close to my annual quota for public transport, so it's good to get it out of the way in one chunk. Except I still have to head back. We're (Jon and myself) on the way to Abisko, a place so far north it's practically Norway. The plan is then to saunter on down through Sweden, heading for a mountain to climb and a hut with the promise of hot water.
